reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2010, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Have just had 2 nights at this hotel and can thorougly recommend. If you get a room with a balcony (ask for room 8) you'll be happy just to sit on the balcony, drinking a glass of wine or beer and enjoying the fantastic panorama; it gets the late evening sun so you can enjoy until dark. The name of the hotel really does apply in this case; it overlooks Pfronten with the mountains and Austria in the near distance.
reviews.title: "Room with a View"

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Room was comfortable and had everything we needed. A very good buffet breakfast and good (but limited) evening menu. For 2 nights that's not a problem but you might get tired of the choice if you are there for much longer. Meals can be taken on the sun terrace but you might find yourself competing with the locals for a chair, it's obviously very popular with the people who live there, always a good sign. Owner/chef and wife very friendly, you won't be disappointed. We speak german which might help but the previous review in no way reflects what we found! There is so much to see and visit in this most southerly bit of Germany, you won't be disappointed.
reviews.title: Incredibly shoddy treatment

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: PS We had fantastic weather which probably helped!!
reviews.title: Charm hotel with panoramic views and lovely staff!

likes.liked: — The panoramic views of the moutains and city below, and the friendliness of the staff.
